name: The General of Pylos
description: A later chapter in the the epic tale of the Elementals. If you haven't played my first twine game, The Chancellor of Hydria, then play that first. It contains some initial plot building that is not present in this story. Lead the General of Regethon through the city of Pylos, erected and on the verge of destruction courtesy of Pyrax, the Elemental of Fire. Learn about my expansive world alongside this character who is also experiencing a new corner of his world.
